# Introduction {-}

This book is **unpublished** and should be considered an **early build** version. There will be **bugs**, **typos** and **errors**. Please report them [here](https://github.com/agarbiak/CS1/issues).

## Motivation {-}

The purpose of this book is to help actuaries studying [Actuarial Statistics (CS1)](https://www.actuaries.org.uk/studying/curriculum/actuarial-statistics) from the Institute and Faculty of Actuaries by providing `R` code examples across the following topic areas:

1. Random variables and distributions
2. Data analysis
3. Statistical inference
4. Regression theory and applications
5. Bayesian statistics
